explains: adv. 过分地，过量地；极度

sentences.en: Managers are also accused of paying themselves excessively high salaries.
sentences.cn: 经理们还被指责给自己发过高的工资。

sentences.en: Hardy has often been criticized for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
sentences.cn: 哈迪因其过分悲观的人生观而经常受到批评。

sentences.en: They were so afraid of me, and yet they were so excessively fond of me.
sentences.cn: 他们那么怕我，可是他们又那么喜欢我。
